projects.description: Designed and developed an educational website using HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to provide online learning resources. Displayed graphs and logs in web interfaces of 6,000+ monthly requests using HTML, JavaScript, and Reactjs.

projects.name: BuyEasy E-commerce Website
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Flight Price Prediction system to assist travelers in making informed decisions regarding ticket purchases also multiple disease prediction using Machine Learning, Data Science. Designed and developed a fully functional e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript for a seamless online shopping experience.

experiences.description: Acquired practical experience in cloud security best practices, implementing identity and access management (IAM) policies, encryption, and monitoring solutions. Developed a strong foundation in cloud technologies, with a primary focus on AWS services, cloud architecture, security, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC).

Demonstrated a keen ability to adapt and learn quickly, contributing to the successful implementation and completion of project goals. Collaborated closely with team members to troubleshoot issues, conduct regular project updates, and ensure the projects timely delivery.
